name: Brava

biography.description: Brava deploys Kludge Drones that can hack and reprogram defender electronic devices, turning them against their owners or neutralizing them remotely.

gameplayTips: Hack defender cameras to gain valuable intel for your team.
Reprogram defender gadgets like Kapkan traps or Bandit batteries to work against them.
Use your Kludge Drones to neutralize defender utility without exposing yourself.
Coordinate with your team to maximize the impact of hacked devices.
